programme.title: Wildest Africa: Madagascar: Islands of Monsters
programme.desc: Madagascar is truly a weird and wonderful land. Isolated on an island of extreme and magical looking locations, life has adapted and diversified. With few predators, numbers have proliferated and natural selection has gone mad.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Venezuela: The Treasure of El Dorado
programme.desc: Venezuela is famous for its lost worlds, its forbidding mountains, huge swamps, and impenetrable jungles, all seemingly cut off in space and time. Yet each is linked, by the mighty river: the Orinoco, the rumoured route to El Dorado, city of gold.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Patagonia: The Ends of the Earth
programme.desc: Patagonia is a place of extremes Â– of vast ice fields and snow-capped mountains; of windswept deserts, and violent oceans. Survival here means being tough enough to cope with brutal winters, and canny enough to exploit brief seasons of plenty.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ethiopia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and surrounded by five countries, Ethiopia is one of east Africa's forgotten lands. Seemingly passive deserts in fact seethe with fire, and cloud-piercing peaks shield a secret Eden of canyons and cliff-tops teeming with life.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Pantanal: Brazil's Wild Heart

programme.title: World's Greatest: Drives
programme.desc: A journey by road expands our horizons, allowing us to explore the depth and breadth of whole countries and continents, stopping whenever and wherever we chose.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Land Adventures
programme.desc: Most land adventures come with some risk - a chance to confront our deepest fears, resist the pull of the ordinary, and soar into the wild unknown.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Sacred Sites
programme.desc: Ancient in architecture and detailed in design, these man-made masterpieces stand as testaments to the strength of human faith. These sites endure as a timeless reminder of resilience, respect, and the need to reflect.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Volcanic Islands
programme.desc: They've been worshiped and feared over the millennia. But in the wake of drama and destruction, the elements give rise to cultures and nations so beautiful that we've come to know them as the world's greatest volcanic islands.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Global Cities
programme.desc: Travel to the centers of wealth, power, industry, and innovation. From London to Tokyo, Hong Kong to New York, these are the cities that never sleep. The influence held in these economic hubs unites the global community.

programme.title: Arthur: Binky Goes Nuts/Breezy Listening Blues
programme.desc: When Binky discovers that he's allergic to peanuts, he has so many questions, but learns that the best way not to go nuts is to be well informed and to understand his allergy. Much to his horror, Brain gets a "B-" on a test.

programme.title: Arthur: Sue Ellen Gets Her Goose Cooked/Best of The Nest
programme.desc: Sue Ellen is the champion of the popular Internet game, Virtualgoose.com, but sheâ€™s become obsessed! And now the gang has moved onto Best of the Nest. Will any of his friends be willing to forgo their computers for a real, live adventure?

programme.title: Arthur: Prunella the Packrat/What's in a Name?
programme.desc: Prunella saves everything. Can Arthur help her break her packrat habits in time to put together the display for the school's Earth Day fair? Binky find out that his real name isn't Binky--it's Shelley?!

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur The Wrecker/Arthur and The True Francine
programme.desc: Arthur always seems to wreck things, and this time it's Mom's computer. Can he get it fixed before Mom finds out? Then, Muffy A. Crosswire and Francine are absolute best friends, despite their rather obvious differences.

programme.title: Arthur: Making Conversation/A Cloudy Day
programme.desc: Talking to adults makes George want to hide! When he learns he must go to a grown-up party, he turns to his friends for help. Then, Arthur and his friends learn that old silent films can be just as much fun as the movies theyâ€™re used to.

programme.title: Arthur: Francine's Big Top Trouble/George Blows His Top
programme.desc: Francine is sure she will be a star at circus camp. How hard could it be? Then, George is always more than happy to lend his pals whatever they need. But Buster's borrowing gets out of control.

programme.title: Arthur: The Tattletale Frog/D.W. & Bud's Higher Purpose
programme.desc: When Bud is blamed for an accident D.W. causes, she has to decide whether to let her friend take the fall. D.W. and Bud can't wait to ride a new rollercoaster. Will they make it past the ticket taker, or will they come up short?

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Secret Admirer/The Last King of Lambland
programme.desc: Buster receives a box of chocolates in the mail from a secret admirer. It's driving him crazy! Who could possibly like him that much? And James receives a gift from his uncle in Scotland--a toy lamb that will give its owner special powers!

programme.title: Arthur: Fern and the Case of the Stolen Story/Sue Ellen Vegges Out
programme.desc: Fern has writer's block! Fortunately, Ladonna's full of stories, and Fern decides to "borrow" the tales and simply change the names. Then, when Sue Ellen decides to stop eating meat, Muffy and Francine compete to be the best vegetarian.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Japan continues its suicidal resistance, and invading it looks costly. After 2 atomic bombs, the Emperor intervenes and stops the War. Stalin grabs territory in East Asia. The War is over, and the Atomic Era and the Cold War start.

programme.title: Tony Robinson's VE Day: Minute by Minute
programme.desc: Take a unique look at a pivotal day in the history of the modern world, delving into the key events that made VE Day such a momentous 24 hours.

programme.title: 1917 - The Real Story
programme.desc: Documentary of the True Story behind the International Blockbuster Film \\"1917\\" . Insight into the story behind the film. The real-life characters and what became of them.

programme.title: Battle of Britain - Empty Skies
programme.desc: Tells the story of 19 men and women who were there. Through a series of filmed interviews their stories have been preserved, allowing them to tell the part they played in the nation's defence in their own words creating a unique collection of accounts.

programme.title: Blitz the Aftermath
programme.desc: With interviews and archive footage showing the sheer amount of devastation â€“ from the loss of life to the immense damage caused to buildings across the country - The Aftermath looks at how the Blitz changed the face of Britain's cities and lives.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Keyonnah & Bow Wow
programme.desc: Superfan Keyonnah can hardly believe her luck, she's almost certain that she's been having an online relationship with her childhood crush, the rapper Bow Wow. Is this too good to be true?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Courtney & Isaak
programme.desc: Courtney broke up with Isaak, who she met online. He's doing everything to get her back. Beauty queen Cassidy Wolf joins Nev to get Isaak to leave Courtney alone for good. (S4, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Rico & Ja'Mari
programme.desc: Rico wants to move to England to care for his ailing mother, but his intense online relationship with Ja'mari, an international male model, is giving him second thoughts about leaving.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Luke & Amy
programme.desc: Drummer Luke first started talking to nurse Amy when she came to one of his gigs 6 months ago. They had an instant spark but unfortunately every time they try and meet she cancels. (S2, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tiana & James
programme.desc: After a three-year online relationship, Tiana moved across the country to be with love-of-her-life James, and reveal her secret. Now in the same state, James seems more elusive than ever. (S4, ep11)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Chitara & Priscilla
programme.desc: Chitara took a big leap and came out to her family when she met Priscilla online, but Priscilla ended their relationship unexpectedly. Now Chitara is determined to find out what happened. (S4, ep5)

programme.title: The City: Fool Me Twice, Shame On Me
programme.desc: Whitney's crushed to learn that Jay's mysterious night out was spent with his ex-girlfriend, Danielle. Olivia steals the credit from Whitney when they style an ELLE cover shoot! (S1, ep11)

programme.title: The Hills: Goodbye for Now / You Know What You Did
programme.desc: In this season finale, Heidi makes her final decision about moving in with Spencer. Lauren looks to Audrina to fill the void left by her best friend, and Whitney flies to New York. (S2, ep12)

programme.title: The Hills: New City, New Drama
programme.desc: Lauren moves from Laguna Beach to Los Angeles for an internship at Teen Vogue, and fashion school. Can she juggle work, school, partying, and all of the drama that will follow? (S1, ep1)

programme.title: The Hills: A Change of Plans
programme.desc: Lauren has to face her boss after the party. Meanwhile, Heidi doesn't take school seriously and makes different plans for her future. (S1, ep2)

programme.title: The Hills: An Unexpected Call
programme.desc: Teen Vogue sends Lauren on an over-night errand that lands her in New York City, Heidi learns that work in party promotion isn't just a party, and Audrina looks to Brian for love. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: The Hills: Lauren and Jason: Part 2
programme.desc: When Jason, Lauren's ex flame from Laguna Beach, reappears in her life, Lauren thinks she may not be over him. Meanwhile, Heidi asks if the price of a new job is worth paying for. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: The City: I'm Sorry Whit
programme.desc: When Jay finds out he's going on tour, Whitney isn't willing to give up on the relationship, but when Jay doesn't give her a choice their relationship ends in a tearful goodbye. (S1, ep12)

programme.title: The City: Finale
programme.desc: Fresh from a breakup with Jay, Whitney questions if she made the right decision leaving LA. An opportunity opens up at work, but Olivia is after the same position. (S1, ep13)

programme.title: The City: Sleeping With The Frenemy
programme.desc: Olivia's working at ELLE Magazine, but meets her match in co-worker Erin Kaplan. Whitney returns to work for Kelly Cutrone, &amp; an old friend's in town, looking to crash with her. (S1, ep14)

programme.title: The City: Working Girls
programme.desc: Whitney wonders if working with a friend is a good idea when Roxy steps out of line on day one. Olivia wins Joe Zee's approval on a new project at ELLE, but Erin isn't impressed. (S1, ep15)
